titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the Church of S. Mary le Bow, before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and Court of Aldermen, on the thirtieth of January, MDCLXXXIII, being the anniversary day of humiliation for the martyrdom of K. Charles the First by Edward Lake ...
titleStmt.author: Lake, Edward, 1641-1704.
